main event: A bright red light was observed low on the horizon in Fairborn, Ohio. The object remained stationary for 15 minutes.
interesting points: The sky was overcast and no stars could be seen.
The witness reported seeing many other UFOs that she couldn't recall the details of.
The object did not move during the 15-minute observation.
No physical evidence or photographs were obtained.
The object was ultimately classified as 'Unidentified'.
